title: Is there any way I could get 'em?
selftext:
Heyy people, I just bought these pair of Hola off headphonezone.in. Pretty good sound for the price

I got the seal broken off on the right side, and now the eartips have no support to hold on to the IEM(they're DIRTY, I'm sorryðŸ™ƒ), and they just fall off. 
But the connecting pins, wires are in very good condition.

Please let me know if there's any website where I could order just the IEMs, without the wires, pins? Thanks in advance!
comments: A small dab of fewiquik should be enough to hold them.
